sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import {
    HeroContainer,
    HeroBg,
    VideoBg,
    HeroContent,
    HeroH1,
    HeroP,
    HeroBtnWrapper,
    ArrowForward,
    ArrowRight,
    FormWrap,
    FormContent,
    Form,
    FormH1,
    FormLabel,
    FormInput,
    FormButton,
} from './HeroElements';
import Video from '../../videos/video.mp4';
import {Button} from '../ButtonElement';

const HeroSection = () => {
    const [hover, setHover] = useState(false);
    
    const onHover = () => {
        setHover(!hover);
    }

    return (
        <HeroContainer>
            <HeroBg>
                <VideoBg autoPlay loop muted src={Video} type="video/mp4" />
            </HeroBg>
            <HeroContent>
                <HeroH1>Make your ideas a reality with us...</HeroH1>
                <Container>
                    <FormWrap>
                        <FormContent>
                            <Form action="#">
                                <FormH1>Enter your ideas here...</FormH1>
                                <FormLabel htmlFor='for'>Email</FormLabel>
                                <FormInput type='email' required />
                                <FormLabel htmlFor='for'>Your idea</FormLabel>
                                <FormInput type='text' required />
                                <FormButton type='submit'>Submit</FormButton>
                            </Form>
                        </FormContent>
                    </FormWrap>
                </Container>
                <HeroBtnWrapper>
                    <Button type="submit" onMouseEnter={onHover} 
                    onMouseLeave={onHover} primary='true' dark='true'>
                        Get Started {hover ? <ArrowForward /> : <ArrowRight />}
                    </Button>
                </HeroBtnWrapper>
            </HeroContent>
        </HeroContainer>
    )
}

export default HeroSection;
